targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  count(DISTINCT(meta_client_name))
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_slot
WHERE
  -- $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from:date:seconds})
  AND slot_start_date_time <= (toDateTime(${__to:date:seconds}) - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
    meta_client_geo_latitude as latitude,
    meta_client_geo_longitude as longitude,
    meta_client_geo_city as city,
    count(DISTINCT meta_client_name) as `count`
    
FROM 
    ${table_prefix}beacon_api_slot
WHERE
    slot_start_date_time >= now() - toIntervalMinute(2)
    AND slot_start_date_time <= now() - toIntervalMinute(1)
    AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
    AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
    AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
    AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
    AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY
    slot_start_date_time,
    meta_client_geo_longitude,
    meta_client_geo_latitude,
    meta_client_geo_city
ORDER BY slot_start_date_time DESC
LIMIT 1 by latitude, longitude

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  count(DISTINCT(slot))
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_chain_reorg
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1000

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as timestamp,
    sumMerge(blocks) as count
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_slot

WHERE $timeFilter
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})

GROUP BY
    timestamp
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(epoch_start_date_time), 120) * 120) * 1000 as timestamp,
    sumMerge(blocks) as count
FROM default.beacon_api_slot

WHERE epoch_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1676109600) AND epoch_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1676116800)
  AND meta_client_name IN ('xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-teku-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-teku-001')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('goerli')
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN ('OC','EU')
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN ('teku','prysm','nimbus','lodestar','lighthouse')
  AND meta_consensus_version IN ('vUNKNOWN+gd368966','v3.4.0-38514c0+','v1.4.2','unknown (linux amd64)','v23.1.1-20fc35-stateofus')

GROUP BY
    timestamp

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})

GROUP BY

targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(epoch_start_date_time), 120) * 120) * 1000 as timestamp,
    sumMerge(attestations) as count
FROM default.beacon_api_slot

WHERE epoch_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1676109600) AND epoch_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1676116800)
  AND meta_client_name IN ('xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-teku-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-teku-001')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('goerli')
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN ('OC','EU')
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN ('teku','prysm','nimbus','lodestar','lighthouse')
  AND meta_consensus_version IN ('vUNKNOWN+gd368966','v3.4.0-38514c0+','v1.4.2','unknown (linux amd64)','v23.1.1-20fc35-stateofus')

GROUP BY
    timestamp

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  count(DISTINCT(meta_client_name))
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_slot
WHERE
  -- $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from:date:seconds})
  AND slot_start_date_time <= (toDateTime(${__to:date:seconds}) - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation = '${consensus_implementation}'
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(propagation_slot_start_diff) max,
  quantile(0.95)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p95,
  avg(propagation_slot_start_diff) average,
  quantile(0.50)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p50,
  quantile(0.05)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p05,
  min(propagation_slot_start_diff) min
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 100000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries + 12000 as timestamp,
    multiply(floor(divide(propagation_slot_start_diff, $heatmap_interval)), $heatmap_interval) as diff,
    count() as count
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block

WHERE $timeFilter
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 100000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(slot_start_date_time), 12) * 12) * 1000 + 12000 as timestamp,
    multiply(floor(divide(propagation_slot_start_diff, 250)), 250) as diff,
    count() as count
FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block

WHERE slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1685255484) AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1685256012)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 100000
  AND meta_client_name IN ('xatu-sentry-ams3-mainnet-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-mainnet-prysm-002','xatu-sentry-sfo3-mainnet-prysm-001')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('mainnet')
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN ('OC','NA','EU')
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN ('prysm')
  AND meta_consensus_version IN ('unknown (linux amd64)')

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  stddevPop(propagation_slot_start_diff) `std dev population`,
  quantile(0.90)(propagation_slot_start_diff) - quantile(0.10)(propagation_slot_start_diff) `p90 - p10`
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 10000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(diff) max,
  quantile(0.95)(diff) p95,
  avg(diff) average,
  quantile(0.50)(diff) p50,
  quantile(0.05)(diff) p05,
  min(diff) min
FROM (
    SELECT
        slot,
        slot_start_date_time,
        block,
        meta_network_name,
        max(propagation_slot_start_diff) - min(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS diff
    FROM ${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
    WHERE
        $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
        AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
        AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
    GROUP BY slot, slot_start_date_time, block, meta_network_name, meta_consensus_implementation
)
WHERE
  diff > 0
  AND diff < 100000
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

panels.title: Block propagation difference between sentries (by consensus client)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  slot_start_date_time,
  count(DISTINCT(block))
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY slot_start_date_time
ORDER BY slot_start_date_time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(epoch)
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(slot)
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  meta_client_name as name,
  sumMerge(blocks) as count
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_slot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time, meta_client_name
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 100000

WITH 
    filtered_v1 AS (
        SELECT block, propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
        AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 8000
        AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
        AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
        AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
    ),
    filtered_v2 AS (
        SELECT block_root, floor(block_total_bytes / 25600) * 25600 AS bucketed_bytes
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v2_beacon_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
    )
SELECT 
    max(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) max,
    quantile(0.95)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p95,
    avg(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) average,
    quantile(0.50)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p50,
    quantile(0.05)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p05,
    min(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) min,
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
FROM 
    filtered_v1
GLOBAL INNER JOIN 
    filtered_v2
ON 
    filtered_v1.block = filtered_v2.block_root
GROUP BY
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes ASC;

panels.title: Block propagation for block size (25KiB buckets)

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
    filtered_v1 AS (
        SELECT block, propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
        AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 8000
        AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
        AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
        AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
    ),
    filtered_v2 AS (
        SELECT block_root, floor(block_total_bytes / 102400) * 102400 AS bucketed_bytes
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v2_beacon_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
    )
SELECT 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes,
    max(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) max,
    quantile(0.95)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p95,
    avg(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) average,
    quantile(0.50)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p50,
    quantile(0.05)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p05,
    min(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) min
FROM 
    filtered_v1
GLOBAL INNER JOIN 
    filtered_v2
ON 
    filtered_v1.block = filtered_v2.block_root
GROUP BY
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes ASC;

WITH

        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v2_beacon_block

SELECT

    min(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) min,
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
FROM 
    filtered_v1
GLOBAL INNER JOIN 
    filtered_v2
ON 
    filtered_v1.block = filtered_v2.block_root
GROUP BY
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes ASC;

panels.title: Block propagation for block size (compressed, 25KiB buckets)

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
    filtered_v1 AS (
        SELECT block, propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
        AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 8000

SELECT

GLOBAL INNER JOIN

GROUP BY
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes ASC;

panels.title: Block propagation for block size (compressed, 100KiB buckets)

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
    filtered_v1 AS (
        SELECT block, propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
        AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 8000
        AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
        AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
        AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
    ),
    filtered_v2 AS (
        SELECT block_root, floor(execution_payload_transactions_total_bytes / 25600) * 25600 AS bucketed_bytes
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v2_beacon_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
    )
SELECT 
    max(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) max,
    quantile(0.95)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p95,

    quantile(0.50)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p50,
    quantile(0.05)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p05,
    min(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) min,
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
FROM 
    filtered_v1
GLOBAL INNER JOIN 
    filtered_v2
ON 
    filtered_v1.block = filtered_v2.block_root
GROUP BY
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes ASC;

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
    filtered_v1 AS (
        SELECT block, propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
        AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 8000
        AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
        AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
        AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
    ),
    filtered_v2 AS (
        SELECT block_root, floor(execution_payload_transactions_total_bytes_compressed / 102400) * 102400 AS bucketed_bytes
        FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v2_beacon_block
        WHERE slot_start_date_time >= $__fromTime AND slot_start_date_time <= $__toTime
    )
SELECT 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes,
    max(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) max,
    quantile(0.95)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p95,
    avg(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) average,
    quantile(0.50)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p50,
    quantile(0.05)(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) p05,
    min(filtered_v1.propagation_slot_start_diff) min
FROM 
    filtered_v1
GLOBAL INNER JOIN 
    filtered_v2
ON 
    filtered_v1.block = filtered_v2.block_root
GROUP BY
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes
ORDER BY 
    filtered_v2.bucketed_bytes ASC;

panels.title: Block propagation for execution transactions size (compressed, 100KiB buckets)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(propagation_slot_start_diff) max,
  quantile(0.95)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p95,
  avg(propagation_slot_start_diff) average,
  quantile(0.50)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p50,
  quantile(0.05)(propagation_slot_start_diff) p05,
  min(propagation_slot_start_diff) min
FROM default.${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_blob_sidecar
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  -- AND propagation_slot_start_diff < 30000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries + 12000 as timestamp,
    toUInt8(propagation_slot_start_diff / ${heatmap_interval}) * ${heatmap_interval} as diff,
    sum(toUInt16(1)) as count
FROM ${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_blob_sidecar

WHERE $timeFilter
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
  AND diff < 30000

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
    
LIMIT 10000000
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(slot_start_date_time), 12) * 12) * 1000 + 12000 as timestamp,
    toUInt8(propagation_slot_start_diff / 250) * 250 as diff,
    sum(toUInt16(1)) as count
FROM beacon_api_eth_v1_events_blob_sidecar

WHERE slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1696882980) AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1696886580)
  AND meta_client_name IN ('xatu-sentry-ams3-mainnet-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-mainnet-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-mainnet-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-mainnet-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-mainnet-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-mainnet-teku-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-mainnet-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-mainnet-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-mainnet-teku-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-mainnet-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-mainnet-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-mainnet-teku-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-mainnet-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-mainnet-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-mainnet-prysm-001')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('mainnet')
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN ('OC','NA','EU')
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN ('teku','prysm','nimbus','lodestar','lighthouse')
  AND meta_consensus_version IN ('vUNKNOWN+g03d2812','v23.7.0-41634f-stateofus','v4.3.0-31daf3a+','unknown (linux amd64)','v1.10.0')
  AND diff < 30000

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
    
LIMIT 10000000

panels.description: The difference between when an blob sidecar is seen by the first and last sentry

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  max(diff) max,
  quantile(0.95)(diff) p95,
  avg(diff) average,
  quantile(0.50)(diff) p50,
  quantile(0.05)(diff) p05,
  min(diff) min
FROM (
    SELECT
        slot,
        slot_start_date_time,
        kzg_commitment,
        meta_network_name,
        max(propagation_slot_start_diff) - min(propagation_slot_start_diff) AS diff
    FROM ${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_blob_sidecar
    WHERE
        $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
        AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to:date:seconds})
        AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
        AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
        AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
        AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
    GROUP BY slot, slot_start_date_time, kzg_commitment, meta_network_name
    HAVING diff > 0 AND diff < 30000
)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 100000

properties.value: Total attestations seen this slot (includes attestations targeting past slots)
Total attestations targeting this slot (includes attestations from future slots)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  count(DISTINCT signature) as attestations
FROM default.${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_attestation
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
    AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
    AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
    AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
    AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
    AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  uniq(signature) AS total
FROM default.${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_attestation
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
    AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
    AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
    AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
    AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
    AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC
LIMIT 10000

panels.description: Similar to inclusion distance but instead of when it was included in a block, it's instead when a sentry saw a attestation and the "distance" between its target and the current slot. "0" being the attestation for the current slot, "1" being current slot - 1 etc.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDateTime(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  percent
FROM 
(
    SELECT
        slot_start_date_time,
        interval,
        round((inclusion_count / interval_total) * 100, 2) AS percent
    FROM
    (
        SELECT
            slot_start_date_time,
            interval,
            inclusion_count,
            sum(inclusion_count) OVER (PARTITION BY slot_start_date_time) AS interval_total
        FROM
        (
            SELECT
                slot_start_date_time,
                floor(divide(propagation_slot_start_diff, 12000)) as interval,
                count(DISTINCT signature) as inclusion_count
            FROM default.${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_attestation

            WHERE
                $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
                AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
                AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
                AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
                AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
                AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
            GROUP BY
                slot_start_date_time,
                interval
            ORDER BY inclusion_count DESC
        )
    )
)
ORDER BY time ASC, percent DESC

targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(slot_start_date_time), 12) * 12) * 1000 + 12000 as timestamp,
    toUInt8(propagation_slot_start_diff / 250) * 250 as diff,
    sum(toUInt16(1)) as count
FROM beacon_api_eth_v1_events_attestation

WHERE slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1688945436) AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1688949036)
  AND meta_client_name IN ('xatu-sentry-syd1-sepolia-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-sepolia-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-sepolia-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-sepolia-teku-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-sepolia-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-sepolia-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-sepolia-teku-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-sepolia-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-sepolia-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-sepolia-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-sfo3-sepolia-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-sepolia-prysm-001')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('sepolia')
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN ('OC','NA','EU')
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN ('teku','prysm','nimbus','lodestar','lighthouse')
  AND meta_consensus_version IN ('vUNKNOWN+gfccbaf1','v1.8.0','unknown (linux amd64)','v4.1.0-7c0b275+','v23.5.0-748be8-stateofus')
  AND diff < 30000

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff
    
LIMIT 10000000

targets.rawSql:
WITH subquery AS (
    WITH 
    filtered_blocks AS (
        SELECT 
            slot, 
            slot_start_date_time
        FROM beacon_api_eth_v2_beacon_block
        WHERE $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
            AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
    ),
    filtered_attestations AS (
        SELECT 
            signature, 
            slot_start_date_time,
            slot,
            propagation_slot_start_diff
        FROM default.${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_attestation
        WHERE $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
            AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
            AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
            AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
            AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
            AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
            AND propagation_slot_start_diff BETWEEN 0 AND 12000
    ),
    min_propagations AS (
        SELECT 
            signature, 
            slot_start_date_time, 
            MIN(intDiv(propagation_slot_start_diff, 250) * 250) as min_propagation_bucket
        FROM filtered_attestations 
        GROUP BY 
            signature,
            slot_start_date_time
    )
    SELECT 
        b.slot_start_date_time as slot_start_date_time, 
        m.min_propagation_bucket AS min_propagation_bucket, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.signature) AS count
    FROM min_propagations m
    JOIN filtered_attestations a 
        ON a.signature = m.signature 
        AND a.slot_start_date_time = m.slot_start_date_time
        AND intDiv(a.propagation_slot_start_diff, 250) * 250 = m.min_propagation_bucket
    JOIN filtered_blocks b 
        ON a.slot = b.slot
    GROUP BY 
        b.slot_start_date_time, 
        m.min_propagation_bucket
)
SELECT 
    toDateTime(slot_start_date_time) as time,
    min_propagation_bucket as diff,
    count
FROM subquery
ORDER BY 
    slot_start_date_time, 
    min_propagation_bucket

panels.description: For a given slot, what beacon block roots had attestations against them

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDateTime(slot_start_date_time) as time,
  percent
FROM 
(
  SELECT
      slot_start_date_time,
      beacon_block_root,
      round((attestation_count / beacon_block_root_total) * 100, 2) AS percent
  FROM
  (
      SELECT
          slot_start_date_time,
          beacon_block_root,
          attestation_count,
          sum(attestation_count) OVER (PARTITION BY slot_start_date_time) AS beacon_block_root_total
      FROM
      (
          SELECT
              slot_start_date_time,
              beacon_block_root,
              sum(toUInt32(1)) AS attestation_count
          FROM default.${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_attestation
          WHERE
              $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
              AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
              AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
              AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
              AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
              AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
          GROUP BY
              slot_start_date_time,
              beacon_block_root
          ORDER BY attestation_count DESC
      )
  )
)
ORDER BY time ASC, percent DESC

FROM default.${attestation_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_attestation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(slot_start_date_time)
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})
GROUP BY time

FROM (
    SELECT

        meta_network_name,

)

  $__timeFilter(contribution_slot_start_date_time)
  -- AND contribution_propagation_slot_start_diff < 10000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

SELECT
    $timeSeries + 12000 as timestamp,
    multiply(floor(divide(contribution_propagation_slot_start_diff, $heatmap_interval)), $heatmap_interval) as diff,
    count() as count
FROM default.${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_contribution_and_proof

WHERE $timeFilter
  -- AND contribution_propagation_slot_start_diff < 10000
  AND meta_client_name IN (${client_name})
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN (${geo_continent_code})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
  AND meta_consensus_version IN (${consensus_version})

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff

SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(contribution_slot_start_date_time), 20) * 20) * 1000 + 12000 as timestamp,
    multiply(floor(divide(contribution_propagation_slot_start_diff, 250)), 250) as diff,
    count() as count
FROM default.beacon_api_eth_v1_events_contribution_and_proof

WHERE contribution_slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(1676109600) AND contribution_slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(1676116800)
  
  AND meta_client_name IN ('xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-teku-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-lighthouse-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-nimbus-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-lodestar-001','xatu-sentry-ams3-goerli-prysm-001','xatu-sentry-syd1-goerli-teku-001')
  AND meta_network_name IN ('goerli')
  AND meta_client_geo_continent_code IN ('OC','EU')
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN ('teku','prysm','nimbus','lodestar','lighthouse')
  AND meta_consensus_version IN ('vUNKNOWN+gd368966','v3.4.0-38514c0+','v1.4.2','unknown (linux amd64)','v23.1.1-20fc35-stateofus')

GROUP BY
    timestamp,
    diff

list.definition:
SELECT meta_network_name
FROM ${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY meta_network_name
list.label: Network
list.name: network_name
list.query:
SELECT meta_network_name
FROM ${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY meta_network_name

list.definition:
SELECT meta_client_name
FROM ${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY meta_client_name
list.label: Sentry
list.name: client_name

  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})

SELECT meta_consensus_implementation
FROM ${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
GROUP BY meta_consensus_implementation

list.definition:
SELECT meta_consensus_version
FROM ${table_prefix}beacon_api_eth_v1_events_block
WHERE
  slot_start_date_time >= toDateTime(${__from} / 1000)
  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
GROUP BY meta_consensus_version
list.label: Consensus client version
list.name: consensus_version

  AND slot_start_date_time <= toDateTime(${__to} / 1000)
  AND meta_network_name IN (${network_name})
  AND meta_consensus_implementation IN (${consensus_implementation})
GROUP BY meta_consensus_version
